webscript.description:
The body of the POST call should be like: 
   {
      "key": "239ad243-f904-48f9-b59e-0a9cb99ae597",
      "id": "activiti$101"
   }
If the id and/or the key do not match an in-flight registration workflow, the script will return 404. If the cancellation was successful, the script will return 200 and success inidicator as JSON-body.
